bug.author: Superjomn
bug.summary: mul_lstm_fuse_pass result in the precision difference between CPU and GPU computation.

comments.comment: Since you haven't replied for more than a year, we have closed this issue/pr. If the problem is not solved or there is a follow-up one, please reopen it at any time and we will continue to follow up. 由于您超过一年未回复，我们将关闭这个issue/pr。 若问题未解决或有后续问题，请随时重新打开，我们会继续跟进。
